rule.description: Kuna iya shigar da wannan saitin ta hanyar menu na dama akan kowane shafin yanar gizon Lokacin shigar da shafin yanar gizon, za a ƙara URL na shafin yanar gizon ta hanyar tsoho .

url.title: Yanayin URL, cikakken URL.
url.explain: Wannan hanyar zata iya dacewa da cikakkiyar URL.

glob.title: Hanyar glob tana amfani da ɗakin karatu na {{1}} Don Allah duba don amfani, ko kuna iya nemo amfanin {{2}}.

example.a: {{1}}, wanda yayi daidai da shafin farko na YouTube da duk ƙananan shafuka.

regexp.title: Magana na yau da kullun, da fatan za a duba Duba don amfani.

onlyForCurrentRule.title: Kawai yana aiki don ƙa'idar yanzu:
onlyForCurrentRule.explain: Idan an bincika, za a iya amfani da shi kawai don tsarin yanzu, in ba haka ba za a iya amfani da duk dokokin duniya.
